entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
